description: Number of partitions of n into parts 8k+3 or 8k+5.
formula: Expansion of f(-x^8) / f(-x^3, -x^5) in powers of x where f() is a Ramanujan theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 03 2014Euler transform of period 8 sequence [ 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, ...]. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 03 2014a(n) ~ (3-2*sqrt(2))^(1/4) * exp(Pi*sqrt(n/6)) / (4 * 3^(1/4) * n^(3/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ 1 / QPochhammer[ x^3, x^8] / QPochhammer[ x^5, x^8], {x, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 03 2014 *)nmax = 100; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(8k+3))*(1 - x^(8k+5))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015 *)
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
